/user/:userId: GET || User By Id || Requires Authentication
PUT || To Update the profile || Requires Authentication and Autherization
DELETE || To Delete the profile || Requires Authentication and Autherization
/post: GET || TO get all the posts
/post/new/:userId: POST || To Create new Post || Requires Authentication
/post/:postId: DELETE || To delete the post || Requires Authentication and Autherization
PUT || To update the post || Requires Authentication and Autherization
